channel.title: LightSabre model :P
channel.description: [center]I was just messing around with META for the first time lol :) !NO, i did not add buttons etc, NO i didn't put alot of detail into it, i was just getting use to META and seeing how it works! This is what idea i came up with. Even if i did put buttons etc on the handel you wouldn't have been able to see them in the client anyway. :) [IMG]http://i684.photobucket.com/albums/vv208/PhazeDesigns/SabreStripe.png[/img] When rendered in META: [IMG]http://i684.photobucket.com/albums/vv208/PhazeDesigns/12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i684.photobucket.com/albums/vv208/PhazeDesigns/10.png[/img][/center]

item.title: LightSabre model :P
item.dc:creator: @lucas445 lucas445
item.description:
@lucas445 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:7, topic:307692”][quote author=lucas445 link=topic=403844.msg2989693#msg2989693 date=1255224009]

not very good. idk how ppl are so happy with these, all you did was use a few cylinders and color/scale them. lightsabres have buttons, and diff. shades. im not impressed.

Did you not see directly above your post ?
I said if i was going to do it again i’d add more detail etc.
It’s just that i was messing around with META for the first time and came up with this idea …
Maybe they like it because it seems like it’s a good idea that they could expand upon or something?
[/quote]
nah, i think its more because theyre impressed by almost anything. and why not spend more than 2 mins making it, and add detail? i spent more time typin this than you probably did making it. im not tryin to sound like an asshole here, but im tryin to get ppl to actually put time, thought and skill into modelling. we both know you could do better than that[/quote]

but this is more of an idea than a release

Read full topic

item.title: LightSabre model :P
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“lucas445, post:6, topic:307692”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=403844.msg2989662#msg2989662 date=1255221768]
not very good. idk how ppl are so happy with these, all you did was use a few cylinders and color/scale them. lightsabres have buttons, and diff. shades. im not impressed.
[/quote]

Did you not see directly above your post ?
I said if i was going to do it again i’d add more detail etc.
It’s just that i was messing around with META for the first time and came up with this idea …
Maybe they like it because it seems like it’s a good idea that they could expand upon or something?[/quote]
nah, i think its more because theyre impressed by almost anything. and why not spend more than 2 mins making it, and add detail? i spent more time typin this than you probably did making it. im not tryin to sound like an asshole here, but im tryin to get ppl to actually put time, thought and skill into modelling. we both know you could do better than that

Read full topic
